member.name: AUTHENTICODE_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS
member.summary: The AUTHENTICODE_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS structure holds additional Authenticode policy information for chain verification of files.

member.name: AUTHENTICODE_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: AUTHENTICODE_EXTRA_CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_STATUS.fCommercial
member.summary: BOOL flag. If TRUE, a signer has been verified by a CA as meeting certain minimum financial standards.
